This is Cozify Widget for quick control of a Scene or Device directly from the home screen. You need to have a Cozify Smart Home Hub device. Login by entering the email address of your Cozify account to receive a one-time password to the given email address. Then you can create a widget buttons for controlling Scenes and Devices.
1. Select existing widget as a template:
Then type in or copy-paste the password from the email in the field above.

Well done! Connected.\nNext step is to create Widgets to the Android Home screens. This is done by pressing and holding an empty space and selecting Widgets in the popup menu. Then find Cozify Widgets in the list and press and hold again until the list disappears and you an drop the widget in desired location on the screen. You have two options: larger widget to show numeric data from sensors and smaller button for control activities. With several widgets you can build dashboards. Remove a widget with a long press and by selecting delete.
If you are encountering problems with the logic of your rules, please select a Hub and click the button below to open helper.
